help-file.title: MOB MOBILE
help-file.content: The term "mob" will be something you'll hear often on Duris, a shortening of the word "mobile". A mob is usually referred to as an NPC, a monster in the game that isn't played by a person, but rather acts on its own as designated by the creator of it. Mobs are attacked and killed for experience and equipment, as well as other reasons.
